prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body portrait of a beautiful young man standing center on pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich light and shadow variations and visible brushstrokes. A man with exceptionally beautiful and delicate facial features, soft and fair complexion, gentle and slightly melancholic expression. His eyes are large, luminous, and deep, colored in a soft hazel or light brown, reflecting empathy and innocence, with long, dark eyelashes. His eyebrows are finely shaped, his nose is straight and elegant, and his lips are full and softly pink. His face is oval-shaped with a slender jawline. His hair is medium-length, soft and slightly wavy, in a shade of dark brown or chestnut, styled casually with strands falling gently across his forehead. He wears simple, elegant clothing fitting the ethereal fantasy setting: a loose, off-white linen poet shirt with billowing sleeves, paired with tailored dark brown or charcoal grey trousers made of soft fabric. The overall aesthetic is dreamy, poetic, and gentle, embodying the唯美 and细腻 tone of the game world. The character's极高颜值 is emphasized through his refined, almost ethereal beauty and compassionate gaze. no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
